short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Classify web pages in real-time using a local machine-learning model.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Classify web pages in real-time using a local machine-learning model. Choose any of the 345 categories to block.

This extension requires a native app for running the machine-learning model. Go to https://github.com/MaximeSobrier/congress-app-2024 for the installation instruction.

All data are kept local.
